Description: Package managers allow you to manage the dependencies (external code) your project needs to function correctly.
Read about modern JavaScript and its usage, including dependency management.

Topic: An Absolute Beginners Guide to Using npm
Description: Learn the basics of using npm (Node Package Manager), a popular package manager for JavaScript.
Get started with Yarn, a fast and reliable package manager, by following this guide.
Watch a beginner-friendly tutorial on using npm, the Node Package Manager, on YouTube.
Explore a crash course on npm (Node Package Manager) on YouTube, covering its key features and usage.
Watch a crash course on Yarn, a popular package manager, to quickly learn how to use it effectively.
